1. City Council

City Council
============

* City Council Chambers
  206 N. Murphy Road.
  Murphy, TX 75094

View
meeting regulations
for the City Council.


![City Council 2025](https://www.murphytx.org/ImageRepository/Document?documentId=9695)
![Ask Council](https://www.murphytx.org/ImageRepository/Document?documentId=3095)

Individual City Council members may be contacted by following their name link below or the council may be emailed as a
group
. All Council Members are elected at-large and represent all Murphy Citizens.  The Place numbers are important for identifying the Council members.

* [Scott Bradley](https://www.murphytx.org/directory.aspx?EID=6)
  , Mayor
* [Elizabeth Abraham](https://www.murphytx.org/directory.aspx?EID=7)
  , Mayor Pro Tem , Place 1
* [Scott Smith](https://www.murphytx.org/directory.aspx?EID=8)
  , Council Member, Place 2
* [Andrew Chase](https://www.murphytx.org/directory.aspx?EID=10)
  , Council Member, Place 3



* [Ken Oltmann](https://www.murphytx.org/directory.aspx?EID=9)
  , Council Member, Place 4
* [Laura Deel](https://www.murphytx.org/directory.aspx?EID=11)
  , Council Member, Place 5
* [Jené Butler](https://www.murphytx.org/directory.aspx?EID=12)
  , Deputy Mayor Pro Tem, Place 6
